text: The 2015–16 Copa Catalunya was the 27th staging of the Copa Catalunya. The competition began on 1 and 2 August 2015 and was played by teams in Segunda División, Segunda División B, Tercera División and the top teams of Primera Catalana. ==Tournament== ===First round=== The first round was drawn on June 30 and was played on July 31, August 1 and 2. *Bye: Reus ===Second round=== The second round was drawn on June 30 and was played on August 8, 9 and 11. ===Third round=== The third round was drawn on June 30 and was played on August 15 and 16. *Bye: Rubí ===Quarterfinals=== The quarterfinals round was drawn on August 31 and was played on September 30 and October 7. ===Semifinals=== The semifinals round was drawn on October 13 and played on November 11 and December 8. ===Final=== ==External links== *Federació Catalana de Futbol Cata Category:Copa Catalunya seasons Copa
title: 2015–16 Copa Catalunya
